Title: Enhances support and services for students with disabilities for postsecondary success
Summary: Provides grants to SUNY schools, CUNY schools, and certain other degree-granting colleges and universities in NY to provide support and services for students with disabilities for postsecondary success.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enhancing support and services for students with disabilities for postsecondary success
